channel.title: Katelyn's Blog

item.title: Bugs, Mazes, and the Unreasonably Effective Brady's Algorithm
item.description: Tackling a computer science problem about a bug trapped in a maze using an underappreciated algorithm.

item.title: So... this blog is a thing now!

item.description: Generalizing halting problems to higher order arithmetical statements.

item.title: All About Space Needle
item.description: An exploration of a very interesting, and very difficult turing machine
